text.description:
{Hydra's Blood}

Stack equipped with this artifact has a bonus of +3 to Max Health, an additional 20% to Max Health and Regenerates 75 Health per turn.
text.event: You see a mighty man dressed in a lion's skin fight a ferocious hydra using a massive club. You help him out, and together take the spoils the creature has to provide.
text.name: Hydra's Blood
